channel.title: CVE Feed for http://haml.info/ -- all

item.title: CVE-2017-1002201|2024-08-05T22:08:11.499Z -- http%3A%2F%2Fhaml.info%2F -- haml
item.description: In haml versions prior to version 5.0.0.beta.2, when using user input to perform tasks on the server, characters like < > " ' must be escaped properly. In this case, the ' character was missed. An attacker can manipulate the input to introduce additional attributes, potentially executing code.
